blog.name: ao3feed-clintxnat
blog.title: love is for children, i owe him a debt.
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of all fic posted on the Archive Of Our Own under the Clint Barton/Natasha Romanov pairing tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed using an IFTTT recipe, but this was made easy thanks to astolat (astolat.tumblr.com). If you would like to set up a similar blog, see the instructions tab :) To check announcements regarding these blogs, go to the tumblr tag #ao3feed announcement. (moderated by enjolbutt.tumblr.com) I hope this blog helps when you are in dire need of feels or a laugh, so enjoy! :)

blog.title: a sidekick in a hero world
blog.description: ask requests fandoms characters writing ennasfavorites

summary: She knew whichever she decided, she would later regret. Wanda had given up that life, wanted to leave it in the past, behind...
body: She knew whichever she decided, she would later regret. Wanda had given up that life, wanted to leave it in the past, behind her. There were no feeling more free than dropping that weight, that guilt, breathing for herself again. Without her, though, they’d be facing him, his army, one less. That could mean life and death for the world, you’d understand eventually. There was no time to go to you, to apologize, to wish for forgiveness, to explain. She did what she promised she would never do again, she dissapeared, headed towards the danger instead of running from it. She’d make it up to you, she told herself, if there was anything to come back to…

blog.name: do-you-lay-eggs
blog.title: Ay! Tony!!
blog.description:
multi fandom side blog • Lola • she/her
✨ dm me // starker ✨

body:
Tony being Peter’s saviour

-

Peter was definitely an outcast. A depressed outcast at that. All because of some stupid rumour Flash made about him in his freshman year. Now Peter was seen as the kid who slept with his cousin. It was so small in the beginning, no one thought anything of it but then he started to get associated with it. “Oh, Peter Parker, the one that slept with his cousin?” “Yeah.” And he heard this, and Flash never even tried to make it better. This caused his friends to slowly leave his side, not standing up for him once. They didn’t want to be associated with that, why would they? Peter thought it was fair. He did have MJ though who he would talk to occasionally but even she didn’t like the looks she got when seen with him. It broke Peter in more ways than one.

Then.. he started the Stark internship. A place where no one knew this rumour. They only knew of his cute smile and smart brain. He felt like he was finally making friends for the first time in forever. Whether it be with some of the interns his age from other schools or the older employees he would bring coffee to. Especially Mr Stark himself. Peter felt special and appreciated with Mr. Stark around him, way different than what he felt at school. He was finally getting out of his funk.

Then came the fateful day where his moves, tripping and spilling coffee everywhere, worked on Tony. Once they both realized what feelings they felt for each other, they could barely keep their hands off each other. Tony would call Peter out of school whenever he asked if he knew it was going to be especially bad that day. And was Tony Stark going to say no to a few extra hours with Peter? Of course not.

After a while the relationship advances, Peter’s grades go up, despite missing a lot of school, Peter is happier because even though his school life is shitty, he knows he has something to look forward to at the end of the day.

Peter had mentioned how there was a rumour about him and that’s why he hated school but he never told Tony exactly what it was. When Peter felt comfortable enough in their relationship he felt he had no choice but to tell Tony. So he did. And Tony just held the boy as he ranted about it and cried, half sad tears, half happy tears that someone finally understood and was willing to listen. Peter didn’t even have any cousins.

The next day Peter woke up in a rush since his alarm never went off but Tony’s coffee maker did and that woke him. He begged Tony to take him to school instead of a driver and Tony obliged, feeling a softness for the boy. Tony pulled on a sensible outfit and Peter wore what he did yesterday despite Tony’s protests. Within no time they were at the front of the school with time to spare. “Stay in the car.” Tony said as Peter unbuckled and before Peter could say anything, he stepped out of his luxurious looking car and glanced around. He was quick to get a few stares as he was Tony Freaking Stark. There were murmurs as Tony walked around the car and opened the door for Peter who stepped out, holding his books to his chest. He glanced around before thanking Tony but Tony stopped him from walking away by placing a hand on his shoulder and telling him to have a good day and such.

A girl on a bench with her friend giggled as they watched the two talk. “I wonder if he knows Peter fucked his cousin” She commented and before the other could even laugh, Tony was sending her a look that could kill. He removed his sunglasses. “He wouldn’t fuck his cousin, he’s fucking me.” He said coldly but with that signature Tony Stark humour tinted to it. Peter’s face got as red a cherry before he nudged Tony and said goodbye with a laugh. Once this got to Flash with photographic evidence of what happened, Flash started to ease up big time and school got a little easier. It was nice having your boyfriend be the most powerful man in the world.

blog.name: im-vey-fragile
blog.title: politics
blog.description: I'm just collecting stuff here, please be kind

title: Avengers Headcanons
body:
Loki in mythology is a victim of rape. In MCU he knows what it’s like to be unwanted and left to die. Pro Life.

Tony was probably pro choice until he walked in on a live abortion and saw the horrors of it and felt the movement went too far. Probably still open to first trimester abortions and special cases of rape/incest.

Steve is an Irish Catholic, definitely pro life. Also born with numerous health conditions and an ideal candidate for abortion, proof that life can get better and the option shouldn’t be taken away.

Bruce Banner works as a doctor to save lives, probably open to rape and incest cases, understanding of crisis pregnancies and maybe open to early trimester.

Bucky probably feels it’s not his call to make as a man, still saw human experimentation and tortures, probably not comfortable with it.

Thor, feels strongly for his brother, would be supportive. Also Asgardian life expectancies are longer so birth is more rare. The thought of killing one would be horrible to him. Birth control on Asgard and fertility times are probably better and less often.

Natasha knows what it’s like to have her choice taken from her, possibly pro choice, but understands the horror of what has been done to her body and the refusal of being allowed the option of having kids which abortion can cause infertility. Could be pro choice, still knows the horror of death, might not be. Guilt of Drakov’s daughter might sway towards life

Clint has kids of his own and a wife, probably agrees with her opinion. Might be supportive of Natasha. Could go either way.

Wanda was experimented on by Hydra and a victim of senseless slaughter from war, fights to protect innocent lives. Probably pro life.

Vision is fascinated by humanity and wants humans to thrive and to protect them, would be against the deaths of unborn.

Sam could go either way, might acknowledge the history of eugenics and be against it. Possibly similar to Bucky and not have much of an opinion.

T’challa has an intimate connection with the afterlife and those who have died, probably knows what happens to the unborn. Would respond accordingly, if abortion is allowed in Wakanda. Protector of the weak, probably pro life in general.
